info.title: Node.js Backend API
info.description:
API Documentation for the Campaign Management & Collaboration Platform
## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication via Bearer token.
## Rate Limiting
API calls are rate-limited to prevent abuse.

post.description: Creates a new user account with first name, last name, email, and password.

400.description: Validation error or Email already in use

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns an access token.
Assigns a role (e.g., Owner, Influencer) to a registered user.

400.description: User already has this role or invalid input

post.description: Generates a new access token using a valid refresh token from cookies.

get.description: Redirects the user to Google login page.
Handles the callback from Google after successful authentication.

post.description: Logs out the current user session.
Logs out the user from all active sessions.

get.description: Retrieves all active sessions for the current user.

delete.description: Revokes a specific session by ID.

get.description: Retrieves the complete user profile with role-specific data and completion percentage.

patch.description: Update fields on the influencer profile (partial update). Accepts JSON body with any subset of allowed fields.
Update fields on the owner profile (partial update). Accepts JSON body with any subset of allowed fields.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all campaigns for the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new campaign draft and triggers AI generation for campaign details.

userDescription.example: A marketing campaign for our new summer clothing line focusing on Gen Z.

201.description: Campaign created and AI preview generated

patch.description: Updates the lifecycle stage of a campaign (OWNER only).

post.summary: Owner sends a collaboration request to an influencer
post.description: Create a collaboration request for a campaign and an influencer. Only Owners may perform this action.

message.example: I'd like to invite you to this campaign

401.description: Access token is missing or invalid

403.description: User does not have permission to access this resource

404.description: The specified resource was not found

example.message: A pending request already exists for this influencer and campaign

get.description:
Retrieve a paginated list of all influencer profiles. 
Owners can browse influencers to find potential collaborators.
Supports filtering by category, platform, followers count, location, and search.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by influencer name or email

401.description: Access token is missing or invalid

403.description: User does not have permission to access this resource

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific influencer profile

401.description: Access token is missing or invalid

403.description: User does not have permission to access this resource

404.description: The specified resource was not found

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive analytics for admin dashboard including user counts, campaign stats, and collaboration metrics.
Retrieves a paginated list of collaboration requests with optional status filter.

patch.description: Update the status of a collaboration request.

get.description: Retrieve a single collaboration by its ID.

patch.description: Update the status of an existing collaboration.
Update a user's account status (ACTIVE, BLOCKED, SUSPENDED, INCOMPLETE).

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all users with optional filters.
Retrieves a paginated list of all user sessions.
Retrieves a paginated list of all collaborations.
Retrieves a paginated list of all campaigns.
Retrieves a specific campaign by ID.

patch.description: Updates the lifecycle stage of a campaign.

UnauthorizedError.description: Access token is missing or invalid

ForbiddenError.description: User does not have permission to access this resource

NotFoundError.description: The specified resource was not found
